text: (soft music)

- [Joe] JMA Wireless is a
leading global innovator
in mobile wireless connectivity solutions
that ensure high performance, reliability,
streamlining service operations
and maximizing wireless performance.

We're an American company
in Syracuse, New York,

and the only one that offers
100% software technology
that's completely decoupled

from the underlying
hardware infrastructure.
JMA and AWS have been working together

to solve key complex 5G
use cases for the industry.

And the thought process
is to provide simple,

efficient and easy to deploy
and operate private networks.

So we embarked on a
journey a few years ago
to reestablish US leadership in 5G.
Building state of the art 5G campus
was a key element to realize our success.
To ensure that we actually have

a homogenous connectivity
across our locations,

we decided to deploy a
private CBRS network.
As you can imagine,
the different areas in this campus

have a completely different
need from one another.
For instance,

our factory requires low
latency and high bandwidth.

So as we leverage our
technology across Rand
to provide these differentiated services,
we saw an opportunity for what was evident
to be cloud enabled from day one
and combining our assets with AWS assets

that gives us an incredible
go-to-market strategy.
For the Syracuse factory,

we are using AWS offering,
like Snowball Edge,
that gives us a path

towards deeper integration
with AWS Cloud assets
to achieve agility and scalability.
The partnership with AWS and JMA

enable us to unlock key
industries, key segments,
to offer new and officiated products
as a joint solution between JMA and AWS.
